item.title: Mob lynches suspected robber in Pirojpur
item.description: Locals have beaten a man suspected of being a robber to death in Pirojpur’s Sadar Upazila. Another person has been injured in the incident. The incident took place around 1:30am on Sunday in Paschim Durgapur village of the Upazila, said Pirojpur Sadar Police Station chief (OC) Rabiul Islam.
